original: Lundberg, Gustaf, professor, Lerum, f. 11/11/01 i Bruzaholm, Jönköp. 1., av civring. Elof L. o. Maria Rose. G. 27 m. Anne-Marie Hedberg. Barn: Karin f. 28, Sigbrit 31, Sten 33, Ingrid 36, Torborg 42. ■— Stud:ex. i Saltsjöbaden 20, KTH 20-22 o. 23-25, fil. mag. v. Sthlms högsk. 26, stud. i Upps. 28-30. Läriförordn. 26-28 o. 30, anst. v. A-B Nomy 30, SKF 37, prof. i elasti-citets- o. hållfasthetslära v. CTH sed. 42. Utg. skr. över rullningslagrens teori, beröringshållfasthet m. m.
translated: Lundberg, Gustaf, professor, Lerum, b. 11/11/01 in Bruzaholm, Jönköping County, 1st son of Elof L. and Maria Rose. Married on the 27th with Anne-Marie Hedberg. Children: Karin b. 28, Sigbrit b. 31, Sten b. 33, Ingrid b. 36, Torborg b. 42. ■— Secondary school degree in Saltsjöbaden in 1920, studied at the Royal Institute of Technology (KTH) in 1920-1922 and 1923-1925, obtained a bachelor's degree at Stockholm University in 1926, studied in Uppsala from 1928 to 1930. Held teaching positions from 1926 to 1928 and 1930, employed by A-B Nomy from 1930 and SKF from 1937. Became a professor of elasticity and strength theory at Chalmers University of Technology since 1942. Published works on the theory of rolling bearings, contact strength, and more.

worksFor.name: Chalmers University of Technology
worksFor.jobTitle: Professor of Elasticity and Strength Theory

publication.name: Skr. över rullningslagrens teori, beröringshållfasthet m. m.
